docket.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a short document giving details of goods that are delivered
docket.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a list of legal cases that will be heard in a particular court
docket.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a list of things that are to be discussed or done
docket.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: What’s on the docket for tomorrow’s meeting?
docket.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a document giving details of goods that have been sold or delivered, the contents of a package etc
docket.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: the old system of having to write out an individual docket for every transaction
docket.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a list of legal cases that will take place in a particular court
docket.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Once your case is on the court’s docket, you and your attorney will have the opportunity to meet with IRS lawyers.
